description: This file defines a data model for a movie script using Pydantic, and sets up an agent that utilizes a Llama model to generate structured output based on the MovieScript schema.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class used to generate and print a response based on input, here invoked with 'New York'.
